column2: At one minute to eight he set off at a brisk pace down the path that would take them to the base of the mountain.

It was right at eight o'clock, maybe a minute before. I went into the demo room to see if I'd left my tin of polish there. And there was this bottle of milk on the trolley and I drank some of it. Just a bit off the top.
I'd spent fifty two days in 1958, but here it was 7.59 in the morning.
